name: Go, froggit!
description:
It's not so easy being a froggit. Frog is not a feather and waterlilies are not a concrete floor. Jump before waterlily drowns and don't forget to eat bugs, or you can starve and lose.
My first mobile godot project (and my first godot project, lol) just for fun and education.
Feel free to test it and leave a comment, it will make me happier :3
Also available on Play Market, and it's ad-free (yet, bwahaha)
